trans-unit.source: Specifies whether smoothing (antialiasing) is applied to lines and curves and the edges of filled areas.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否套用平滑效果 （消除鋸齒） 線條和曲線和填滿區域的邊緣。

trans-unit.source: Default, None, and HighSpeed are equivalent and specify rendering without smoothing applied.
trans-unit.target: Default、 None、 和 HighSpeed 相當，並且指定呈現沒有套用平滑效果。

trans-unit.source: AntiAlias and HighQuality are equivalent and specify rendering with smoothing applied.
trans-unit.target: 反鋸齒功能可以和 HighQuality 是相等的指定與套用平滑效果呈現。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is specified by using the SmoothingMode enumeration, it does not affect text.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性已指定使用 SmoothingMode 列舉，不會影響文字。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To set the text rendering quality, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定的文字呈現品質，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性和<xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint>列舉型別。</xref:System.Drawing.Text.TextRenderingHint> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.TextRenderingHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is specified by using the SmoothingMode enumeration, it does not affect areas filled by a path gradient brush.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性已指定使用 SmoothingMode 列舉，不會影響所路徑漸層筆刷填滿的區域。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Areas filled by using a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> object are rendered the same way (aliased) regardless of the setting for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用的區域填滿<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>物件會呈現相同的方式 （別名） 無論設定為何<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.SmoothingMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush>
